item.dc:creator: @santaguy santaguy
item.description:
@santaguy wrote:

rolf i see it in a sec the problem

if (command.startsWith("switch"){ NpcDialogue = 0; NpcDialogueSend = false; animation(435, absY, absX); RemoveAllWindows(); if (ancients == 1) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1150); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 1; sendMessage("You convert to normal magic!"); } else { setSidebarInterface(6, 12845); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 1; sendMessage("You convert to ancient magicks!"); } }

u FORGET THE ) {
HERE ILL FIX IT GET THOSE GODE

if (command.startsWith("switch")) { NpcDialogue = 0; NpcDialogueSend = false; animation(435, absY, absX); RemoveAllWindows(); if (ancients == 1) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1150); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 1; sendMessage("You convert to normal magic!"); } else { setSidebarInterface(6, 12845); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 1; sendMessage("You convert to ancient magicks!"); } }

item.title: Ok i needdddd help with two things.if anyone helps me i will rep them
item.dc:creator: @rafikd rafikd
item.description:
@rafikd wrote:

if (command.startsWith(“switch”)){
NpcDialogue = 0;
NpcDialogueSend = false;
animation(435, absY, absX);
RemoveAllWindows();
if (ancients == 1) {
setSidebarInterface(6, 1150); //magic tab (ancient = 12855);
ancients = 1;
sendMessage(“You convert to normal magic!”);
} else {
setSidebarInterface(6, 12845); //magic tab (ancient = 12855);
ancients = 1;
sendMessage(“You convert to ancient magicks!”);
}
}

this is without errors!!

if (command.startsWith("switch")){ NpcDialogue = 0; NpcDialogueSend = false; animation(435, absY, absX); RemoveAllWindows(); if (ancients == 1) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 1; sendMessage("You convert to normal magic!"); } else { setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 1; sendMessage("You convert to ancient magicks!"); } }

ok so if anyone can help me fix it thxxxxxxxx

2.can anyone give me the code for full void armor.mage melee and range or if u dont have all just mage

i will be repping to whoever helps me.or to whoever helps me the mosttt.
